steps.name: John is a prospective NL client
he wants to create a Vrij opneembaar savings account
John is the proud owner of a Vrij opneembaar savings account

name: Create a savings account in the Netherlands
description:
As a Dutch prospect
I want to open a savings account
So that I can start using the services MoneYou offers in the Netherlands

name: Personal data validation
description:
As MoneYou
I want to verify the personal data entered by a prospect
So that only valid personal data enters my system
